Programs

Programs: How Data Agency Becomes Action

Programs are configurable bundles of data collection, plans, and insights that organizers create and participants subscribe to — turning individual data into knowledge at any scale.

The Concept

One Framework, Unlimited Applications

A Program is a structured, programmable configuration that an organizer creates and distributes to participants. Every program contains three elements:

Templates & Data Collection — What to track (Events of Interest), what influences them (Factors of Interest), and what they lead to (Outcomes of Interest). Synced from wearables, entered manually, captured by voice, or enriched from environmental data.

Plans & Compliance — Schedules, targets, reminders, and conditions that guide data collection and behavior change. Compliance is tracked automatically, confirming actions through any means.

Insights & Predictions — Correlations, trends, calendar patterns, and predictions derived from collected data. Programs surface knowledge that participants and organizers can act on.

Program Purpose Types
Discover
Identify influences on an Event of Interest. What triggers my migraines? What affects my sleep?
Manage
Ongoing tracking and insight for chronic conditions, mental health, or property care.
Change
Build or break habits with targets and compliance. Lose weight, quit smoking, exercise more.
Maintain
Sustain achieved goals and healthy habits over time with monitoring and accountability.
Prepare / Recover
Structured programs for surgery prep, procedure recovery, or event-triggered protocols like IBS flare-ups.
Program Examples

From Allergy Discovery to Clinical Trials

The same program framework serves radically different use cases depending on who the organizer is and what they're trying to learn.

LiveDiscover

Seasonal Allergies

Track respiratory symptoms against 25+ environmental factors (AQI, pollen, weather) to identify personal triggers. Auto-enriched with local conditions.

LiveManage

Mental Health

Holistic mood, stress, emotion, and medication tracking with correlations to sleep, nutrition, exercise, and environmental factors.

LiveDiscover

Sleep Improvement

Track sleep metrics alongside daily habits, nutrition, exercise, screen time, and environment to discover what helps you sleep better.

Q2 2026Manage

Joint Pain Management

Chronic pain tracking with body map, medication logging, and factor correlation including barometric pressure and activity levels.

Q2 2026Change

Weight Loss

Nutrition tracking with iterative targets, exercise compliance, and AI-driven insights. Progressive goals with weekly milestones.

Q3 2026Research Study

Your Study Here

Design your longitudinal study as a program. Define data requirements, compliance schedules, and insight outputs. Participants collect data through apps.

Q3 2026Corporate

Corporate Wellness

Employee health challenges with group-level insights, compliance tracking, and anonymous aggregate reporting for HR.

Q4 2026Healthcare

Treatment Plans

Provider-created, patient-specific programs with medication compliance, vitals monitoring, and exception alerts.

Q4 2026Clinical

Clinical Trials

Trial protocols as programs with strict compliance requirements, participant dashboards, and raw data export for sponsor analysis.

For Organizers

Who Creates Programs?

Programs are created by organizers and distributed to participants through apps. The same infrastructure serves every type of organizer.

App DevelopersLive

Build health and lifestyle apps that offer programs from the LLIF marketplace. Best Life is the first app developer on the platform — your app could be next.

Research OrganizationsQ3 2026

Universities and research institutions design longitudinal studies as programs with defined data requirements, compliance schedules, and anonymized outputs.

Influencers & Content CreatorsQ3 2026

Health and wellness influencers create curated programs for their audience — a new revenue stream built on real data, not just content.

Corporate WellnessQ4 2026

Employers create wellness programs with group compliance tracking and anonymous aggregate health metrics for insurance and HR outcomes.

Healthcare ProvidersQ4 2026

Clinicians create personalized treatment plans with medication compliance, vitals monitoring, and patient dashboards.

Clinical Trial Sponsors2027

Pharmaceutical and trial organizations use LLIF for focused data collection apps with compliance, insights, and raw data export.

Coming Q3 2026

The Program Marketplace

A searchable directory where participants discover and subscribe to programs — and where organizers publish, distribute, and monetize their work. Public, semi-public, semi-private, and private distribution. Free and paid models.

Want to create a program?

Whether you're an app developer, researcher, health influencer, or organization — we'll help you design and distribute your first program.
